column4: talahan:What brand of card is it? different drivers sometimes have different install scripts
talahan:Have you tried running it from the terminal, or have you only tried double clicking on it?
talahan:Well, now seems like a good time to learn how to use it, you should learn how to use it, as some programs require you to at least understand how it works
It looks similar to DOS which I'm quite familar with. Where do I get a list of basic commands?
